name: vscode-highlight
description: Advanced text highlighter based on regexes. Useful for todos, annotations, colors etc.

highlight.decorations.description: Default decorations from which all others inherit from

after.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted before the decorated text.

contentIconPath.description: An absolute path or an URI to an image to be rendered in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

before.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted before the decorated text.

contentIconPath.description: An absolute path or an URI to an image to be rendered in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

gutterIconPath.description: An absolute path or an URI to an image to be rendered in the gutter.

gutterIconSize.description: Specifies the size of the gutter icon. Available values are 'auto', 'contain', 'cover' and any percentage value. For further information: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj127316(v=vs.85).aspx

outlineColor.description: Applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

outlineStyle.description: Applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

outlineWidth.description: Applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the decoration in the overview ruler. Use rgba() and define transparent colors to play well with other decorations.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

gutterIconPath.description: An absolute path or an URI to an image to be rendered in the gutter.

gutterIconSize.description: Specifies the size of the gutter icon. Available values are 'auto', 'contain', 'cover' and any percentage value. For further information: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj127316(v=vs.85).aspx

isWholeLine.description: Should the decoration be rendered also on the whitespace after the line text.

after.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted before the decorated text.

overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the decoration in the overview ruler. Use rgba() and define transparent colors to play well with other decorations.

outlineWidth.description: Applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the decoration in the overview ruler. Use rgba() and define transparent colors to play well with other decorations.

overviewRulerLane.description: The position in the overview ruler where the decoration should be rendered.

rangeBehavior.description: Customize the growing behavior of the decoration when edits occur at the edges of the decoration's range.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

highlight.regexes.description: Object mapping regexes to an array of decorations to apply to the capturing groups

regexFlags.description: Flags used when building the regexes

highlight.regexFlags.description: Flags used when building the regexes

highlight.maxMatches.description: Maximum number of matches to decorate per regex, in order not to crash the app with accidental cathastropic regexes
